Class SmallInteger

java.lang.Object
SmallInteger
public class SmallInteger extends Object
Class for handling integers within the range [-10000, 10000].
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alexandr Kategov

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SmallInteger(int value)
    Primary constructor that accepts an integer and checks if it is within the valid range.
    SmallInteger(SmallInteger other)
    Copy constructor that creates a new object based on an existing one.

      public SmallInteger(int value)
      Primary constructor that accepts an integer and checks if it is within the valid range.
      Parameters:
      value - the integer value to be stored
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the value is out of the valid range [-10000, 10000]
